name: Fruitwatchers
description:
In this friendly and colorful 2D platformer, you will play as an aprentice of Fruitwatcher, whose task will be to rescue all the fruits lost all around the different worlds, without losing you life trying.

  • 5 different worlds to visit, plus 2 special worlds only available after finishing the game and rescue all the fruits.
  • More than 25 different enemies and traps scattered all over the worlds that won't make it easy for you.
  • 3 hidden characters that you will unlock throughout your adventure. Each of them has their own abilities, which will help you rescue new fruits.

And all this accompanied by a beautiful Pixel-art and a enjoyable music.

Game is available in Spanish and English, you can change between languages in the Main Menu of the game. 

Download the game now and dive into this beautiful adventure!

CREDITS:

  • All the credits for the stunning and beautiful pixel-art goes to the incredible Pixel Frog.
  •  Credits for the incredibly immersive pixel-art used in the Special Level 1 of the game (which you will need to unlock in order to play) go to Jesse Munguia and the credits for the breathtaking Parallax background in the Special Level 2 go to Vnitti.
